display.api_ready_text: All these data's are ready to use with the API functionality.

input.title: Website title
input.logo_help: jpg, jpeg and png accepted. Recommended size: Max height of 40px and transparrent.
input.analytics_code_help: Example: UA-22222222-33 ( Leave empty if you dont have Googele Analytics )
input.directory_help: Set the permissions of who can access the directory page of IG Users.
input.directory_pagination_help: How many results you want to see per show more in the Directory page.
input.index_ad: Ad Code for the Index page
input.report_ad: Ad Code for the Report page
input.recaptcha_help: If enabled, you must add the public and private key from Google Recaptcha API
input.social_help: Enter only the id / name of the page
input.smtp_help: If there are no values entered in this field then the system will try to use the default mail function.
input.smtp_from_help: The email that the users get the email from / the 'reply-to' email ( registration / email activation / lost password )
input.store_help: Please refer to the Documentation to find out where to get the keys.
input.store_unlock_report_price_help: Set to 0 if you want to make all reports available to everyone. Setting to 0 will make the cron check all the reports available, not only those which are purchased.
input.store_unlock_report_time_help: Set the amount of time a report is available to the user after purchasing. Set to 0 if you want the user to have the Report for an ulimited time after purchase.
input.store_user_default_points_help: Default points that a user gets upon registering.
input.instagram_check_interval_help: An account should be verified again after X hours
input.instagram_minimum_followers_help: If the account does not meet the minimum followers, it won't be added to the database.
input.instagram_live_check_interval_help: How often the live counter should ask for a refresh
input.instagram_calculator_media_count_help: How many of the latest posts to process when refreshing a report. (Max 30)
input.cron_url_help: The cron job url that you need to use when creating your cronjob.
input.cron_help: Please refer to the Documentation to find out how to setup the Cron.
input.cron_queries_help: How many accounts to check in one Cron Execution. For optimum performance, select a value between 1 to 5
input.cron_mode_help:
ACTIVE - The cronjob will update only active reports.
ALL - The cronjob will update all the users.
input.credentials_email_template_help: This email template is used when somebody registers through social media. This email will notify the user of their new account and their generated username and password.
input.admin_email_notification_emails_help: Emails that will receive a notification when one of the bottom actions are performed. Add valid email addresses separated by a comma.
input.admin_new_user_email_notification_help: Receive an email when a new users registers to the website.
input.admin_new_payment_email_notification_hel: Receive an email when a new payment is successfully processed.
input.proxy_help: Enabling Proxy will determine the script to try and send request to instagram via Proxies that you have added in Proxies Management
input.proxy_exclusive_help: If enabled, the requests to instagram will only be sent with proxies ( not from the current server )
input.proxy_timeout_help: After how many seconds a proxy request should timeout

input.reset_users_help: ( All users except yours, will be deleted! )
input.reset_instagram_help: ( Unlocked Reports and Favorites will be erased too! )

display.demo_reports_help: Here you can set which reports are displayed on the index and are for free for all users.
display.reset_help: Here you can reset parts of your website if you need it.
